column1: jo. ann marra| jo. ann marra. born: may 24
column4: age 68 longtime ishpeming resident passed away wednesday june 10
column5: 2015 at her home in ishpeming. a memorial service for jo. ann will be celebrated at 11:00 am on monday june 15th at the bjork & zhulkie funeral home where the family will greet relatives and friends from 10:00 am until the time of service at 11:00 am. a complete obituary will appear in friday's mining journal or can be viewed at bjorkandzhulkie. com where relatives and friends may leave a note of remembrance. servicesmemorial service monday
column7: 201511:00 ambjork & zhulkie funeral home inc 400 n. third st. ishpeming
